players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I'm surprised that Bob was found dead so early in the game. It's important we all stay calm and focused to figure out what happened."
Charlie: "Hey everyone, let's try to stay calm and figure out what happened to Bob. Maybe we can discuss his last actions before he was killed?"
Diana: "I agree with Charlie that we should stay calm and try to figure out what happened to Bob. I also remember seeing him alone in the woods last night, so it's possible that he was killed there."
